SVGAttributeBaseline-shift.summary: The baseline-shift attribute allows repositioning of the dominant-baseline relative to the dominant-baseline of the parent text content element. The shifted object might be a sub- or superscript.

blockquote.para: Note: As a presentation attribute baseline-shift can be used as a CSS property.
Note: This property is going to be deprecated and authors are advised to use vertical-align instead.
